task.summary: facebook login, login page, home page
index checks fb login, then redirects to main page (but it calls the facebook login again. should be optimized to pass session information instead)
create board, highlight cell on hover, cells have number and letter as id, created base for Board class
added game buttons js which creates the buttons for the buttons panel. so far 4 buttons for ship choosing, ready button and unready button. Also added to CSS to format the layout a bit
changed from generating html in javascript to just having the buttons in the html. tried to make it prettier too. Ready and Unready button alternate in play
drag and drop. cant drop boat where it's already full. just need to fill other tiles with cloneNodes and then create the list of positions of boats
fixed problem when setting boats. dumb error code. now all boats can be dragged and dropped without problem (except vertically)
finished up the rotation and placing boats. also record the coordinates of the boats when they are placed
added V and H to show if the boat will be horizontal or vertical
reversed directions of coordinates sent as array. also added lengths of boats to drag and drop
fixed the coordinates being pushed to Boat.boatCoordinates (culpa de joaco)

removed unnecessary javascript, fixed listeners for grid buttons calling fire function, added events for when is turn, opponent's turn, and when firing in places/at times when the player shouldn't. Also, whenever the player clicks anywhere on the page, the current error message disappears
